name: Informative Coding
description: Informative Coding is a non-profit organization that helps to learn technology in Bangla. The purpose of which is to motivate people to learn technology by simply introducing them to technology.

name: Dr. Omar Danoun's Blog Website
description: A comprehensive project featuring a robust backend built with Express.js, Node.js, and Mongoose, a modern front-end using React.js and TailwindCSS, and a versatile admin panel for managing content and users. This solution ensures a seamless experience for both site visitors and administrators.

name: School Management System (Website)
description: I've made School Management System (Website, Admin Panel, and Teacher Panel). This is a large project built by NodeJs and Ejs, as the database, I've used MongoDB and mongoose library. I spent a lot of time building this project, where I've created design templates and implemented them in coding. Full documentation and visualization of this project are coming soon. Thanks & regards!
